org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeSQLStorageProviderFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeAbstractStorageProviderFactory
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLStorageProviderFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStorageProviderFactory
public class AeSQLStorageProviderFactory
extends AeAbstractStorageProviderFactory

This factory instantiates SQL versions of the queue, and process state storage objects.

          The default database type if one is not specified in the config.
